title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
description: A martial arts master must protect a powerful sword from falling into the wrong hands.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit named Frodo is given the task of destroying the One Ring, an evil artifact created by the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Spider-Man
description: A teenager named Peter Parker is bitten by a radioactive spider and gains superhuman powers.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns that the world he lives in is actually a computer simulation.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes must come together to save the world from a secret government organization.

title: Batman Begins
description: Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham City to fight crime as Batman.

title: The Departed
description: Two undercover cops, one working for the mob and the other for the police, battle each other over the course of several years.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and becomes a target of a ruthless killer.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman and the Gotham City Police Department must stop the Joker, a psychopathic criminal who plans to destroy the city.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is transported into the body of a genetically engineered Na'vi and sent on a mission to infiltrate the planet of Pandora.
